summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the new language selection feature. All 3 languages (German, English, Bosnian) are working correctly. Language selector displays flag emoji, dropdown opens with all options, translations work for all UI elements, and language preference persists in localStorage.

minor_issues.issue: Bosnian locale (bs-BA) displays dates in unusual format 'M01 5, Mon' instead of proper month names. This is a browser locale limitation, not a code bug.
minor_issues.impact: Minor UX issue - dates are still readable but not in traditional Bosnian format

context_for_next_testing_agent: Language selection feature fully implemented and tested. All 3 languages (DE, EN, BS) working. localStorage key 'goodDeeds_language' stores preference. Minor issue: Bosnian date format shows 'M01' instead of month name due to browser locale limitations.
